alert.note: Alert for Wilkes; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:31PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Wilkes and Yadkin Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 330 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Yadkinville to Brooks Crossroads to Roaring River. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yadkinville... Jonesville... Boonville... Ronda... Windy Gap... Nebo... and Buck Shoals. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
